name: Fever
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 46 "Keep it Alive"

Story: 

Two brothers traverse a perilous desert to find a cure for a deadly mysterious fever. Try to keep your brother’s fever down.

Controls:

WASD - move 

Space - jump

E - Interact with objects

LMB - Advance dialogue

Assets:

- Game Creator (with Stats Module)

- Stylized Nature Bundle

- Characters and assets from the Polygon Adventure Pack, Polygon Western Pack
